  • Methodendetails

    • register

      public void register(String username, String password, String repeat_password) throws IOException
      Registers a new user account with the provided credentials.
      Angegeben von:
      register in Schnittstelle Zugriffsverwaltung
      Parameter:
      username - the desired username
      password - the desired password
      repeat_password - repeated password for confirmation
      Löst aus:
      RemoteException - if RMI communication fails
      UsernameNotAvailable - if the username is already taken
      PasswordsDoNotMatch - if the passwords do not match
      IllegalArgumentException - if any input field is empty or null
      IOException

    • login

      public void login(String username, String password) throws RemoteException, WrongPassword, UsernameNotFound
      Logs in a user by checking their credentials.
      Angegeben von:
      login in Schnittstelle Zugriffsverwaltung
      Parameter:
      username - the username
      password - the password
      Löst aus:
      RemoteException - if RMI communication fails
      WrongPassword - if the password is incorrect
      UsernameNotFound - if the username does not exist

    • logout

      public void logout(String username) throws RemoteException
      Logs out the user with the given username.
      Angegeben von:
      logout in Schnittstelle Zugriffsverwaltung
      Parameter:
      username - the username to log out
      Löst aus:
      RemoteException - if RMI communication fails

    • edit_account

      public void edit_account(String username, String new_username, String password, String new_password) throws Exception, UseDifferentPassword
      Edits the account by updating username and/or password.
      Angegeben von:
      edit_account in Schnittstelle Zugriffsverwaltung
      Parameter:
      username - the current username
      new_username - the new username
      password - the current password
      new_password - the new password
      Löst aus:
      Exception - for RMI or internal errors
      UseDifferentPassword - if the new password is the same as the old one

    • delete_account

      public void delete_account(String username, String password) throws RemoteException, WrongPassword
      Deletes the user account if credentials match.
      Angegeben von:
      delete_account in Schnittstelle Zugriffsverwaltung
      Parameter:
      username - the username of the account to delete
      password - the password for verification
      Löst aus:
      RemoteException - if RMI communication fails
      WrongPassword - if the password is incorrect
